item.title: Report X-2024020813
item.description:
Report X-2024020813

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found in the unload. Container is wet. Part of the contents leaked due to a loose cap. Upon discovery, I placed the package in a red hazmat tote. DescribePack: Part of the contents leaked due to a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon discovery, I placed the package in a red hazmat tote.

  • Description: X-2024020218: SequenceEvent: Found on door 14 upside down with visible leakage. Internal contents have loos caps and internal leakage due to insufficient packaging DescribePack: Loose Caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Item was placed into a clear hazardous materials bag and placed into a red tote. X-2024020220: SequenceEvent: Found on door 14 upside down with visible leakage. Internal contents have loos caps and internal leakage due to insufficient packaging. DescribePack: Loose Caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazardous material was found and quickly put into a clear hazardous materials bag and placed into a red tote. X-2024020221: SequenceEvent: Found on 14 upside down with visible leakage. Internal contents have loose caps and internal leakage due to insufficient packaging. DescribePack: Loose Caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Item was placed into a clear hazardous waste bag and quickly placed into a red tote.

item.title: Report X-2024020184
item.description:
Report X-2024020184

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05

  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the unload at NOKC 732 wet from bottles of Clorox cleaner + bleach that had loose caps. Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag. DescribePack: Box was wet and ripped open as a result of corrosion. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag.

item.title: Report X-2024020176
item.description:
Report X-2024020176

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found at the back of 6 belt with visible wet damage. The package was quickly put into a hazardous materials bag and quickly put into a red tote. Found only 8 Bottles DescribePack: Package had visible external leakage, wet damage. Internal contents had loose caps and internal leakage due to insufficient packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was removed from belt and placed in a hazardous materials bag then quickly placed into a red tote.
